transcript: the strongest driver of pricing power and profits is supply and demand when we make content what we're actually doing is artificially Shifting the demand curve in our favor and the other side of this if you are the business owner you control Supply and so you can inflate your demand in terms of the amount of people who want to work with you or buy from you and at the same time cut your supply and when you have that happen price goes through the roof and so do your profits my goal is to always have significantly less Supply than I have demand because that is the Holy Grail of what you want Which is far more people who want to do business with you then you have capacity to do so
